analysis.description:
Reentrancy in PVCCrowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/22/0x64c54463be7f529ab69e9df33f603c242aed1a85.sol#249-272):
	External calls:
	- token.transfer(beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_chucks/22/0x64c54463be7f529ab69e9df33f603c242aed1a85.sol#267-270)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- TOKENS_SOLD (/unique_chucks/22/0x64c54463be7f529ab69e9df33f603c242aed1a85.sol#271-272)

PVCCrowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/22/0x64c54463be7f529ab69e9df33f603c242aed1a85.sol#249-272) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_chucks/22/0x64c54463be7f529ab69e9df33f603c242aed1a85.sol#267-270)

PVCCrowdsale.takeTokensBack (/unique_chucks/22/0x64c54463be7f529ab69e9df33f603c242aed1a85.sol#336-340) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(owner,remainingTokensInTheContract) (/unique_chucks/22/0x64c54463be7f529ab69e9df33f603c242aed1a85.sol#339-340)

PVCCrowdsale.sendUnsoldTokensToTreasury (/unique_chucks/22/0x64c54463be7f529ab69e9df33f603c242aed1a85.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(treasury,remainingTokensInTheContract) (/unique_chucks/22/0x64c54463be7f529ab69e9df33f603c242aed1a85.sol)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/22/0x64c54463be7f529ab69e9df33f603c242aed1a85.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.21 (/unique_chucks/22/0x64c54463be7f529ab69e9df33f603c242aed1a85.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_startTime' of PVCCrowdsale.PVCCrowdsale (/unique_chucks/22/0x64c54463be7f529ab69e9df33f603c242aed1a85.sol#137-138) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_wallet' of PVCCrowdsale.PVCCrowdsale (/unique_chucks/22/0x64c54463be7f529ab69e9df33f603c242aed1a85.sol#138) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_tokenAddress' of PVCCrowdsale.PVCCrowdsale (/unique_chucks/22/0x64c54463be7f529ab69e9df33f603c242aed1a85.sol#138-139) is not in mixedCase
PVCCrowdsale.isAddressWhiteListed (/unique_chucks/22/0x64c54463be7f529ab69e9df33f603c242aed1a85.sol#126-127) is never used in PVCCrowdsale
